title: Electric flux net flux through Gaussian cube

content.question: What is the magnitude of the electric flux through the right (shaded) face of the Gaussian surface?

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
